With quota 1, accepting A now would lock in my lowest-ranked acceptable candidate and forgo a chance to match with higher-ranked C or D who are already applying, or potentially Seeker_B/Seeker_E in subsequent rounds. Since C and D are both higher on my list and are actively signaling strong interest in Company_B, I should reject Seeker_A now to preserve the slot for a better-ranked candidate.
